note:
Decent British guy, PhD chemist, professional scientist, hobby writer, with stories published (mostly erotica), keen photographer. Co-carer of a delightfully daft dog and two beautiful horses. Pro-humanity, pro-rationalism, happily agnostic.
Very broad-minded, supportive of other's life choices, tastes, hopes and dreams. We often learn by being open to try new things.
Unenthusiastic about all forms of political stupidity and extremism.
Despair of humanity growing up in time to save ourselves.
